# People Convergence Guide {#sec-people-converge-guide .unnumbered} 

This guide should be used with the methods outlined in [Chapter @sec-converge-people-chapter].

## Context {.unnumbered}

Use this worksheet after completing your **Divergence** work. It helps you move from *many candidate communities* toward *one group* you will commit to for ethnographic exploration. Each section aligns with the four stages of convergence: **Compare, Empathize, Assess Access, Select.**
